column6: THE MORTAL IRON FIST PART 1 There is a dark side to the legacy of the Iron Fist. Danny Rand's life stands on the edge of a knife as something centuries-old comes for him in the dark!
column8: | penciller (cover):Travel Foreman | inker:Russ Heath | colorist:Jelena Kevic Djurdjevic | colorist:Matt Milla | letterer:Dave Lanphear | writer:Duane Swierczynski
